solution.text:
\(x^3 - _{{j-k+l}}_x^2 - _{{j*k+k*l-j*l}}_x+_{{j*k*l}}_\)
We shall now look at all the factors of \(_{{j*k*l}}_\)
By trial we find that \(p(_{j}_)=_{{j**3}}_-_{{(j**2)*(j-k+l)}}_-_{{j*j*k+j*k*l-j*j*l}}_+_{{j*k*l}}_=0\)
So,\((x-_{j}_)\,\) is a factor of \(p(x)\).
Now, dividing \(p(x)\,\) by \((x-_{j}_)\,\) we get,
\(p(x)=(x-_{j}_)(x^2-_{{l-k}}_x-_{{k*l}}_)\)
Now, by splitting the middle term we have, \(p(x)=(x-_{j}_)(x^2-_{l}_x+_{k}_x-_{{k*l}}_)\)
\(\Rightarrow p(x)=(x-_{j}_)(x(x-_{l}_)+_{k}_(x-_{l}_))\)
\(\Rightarrow p(x)=(x-_{j}_)(x-_{l}_)(x+_{k}_)\)
